classMembers.name: formName
classMembers.doc: * DeveloperName of the Form to load.

classMembers.name: recordId
classMembers.doc: * Current record Id for the hosted Flow.

classMembers.name: defaultPage
classMembers.doc: * 1-based index of the initial section to show.

classMembers.name: scrollToTopOffset
classMembers.doc: * Pixels to offset when auto-scrolling the Flow into view after nav.

classMembers.name: navWidth
classMembers.doc: * CSS width for the side nav, e.g. "12rem".

classMembers.name: getLanguage
classMembers.doc: * When true, detects language (URL param or org LANG) and passes to Flow as varLanguage.

classMembers.name: sectionsToNotDisplay
classMembers.doc: * Array<string> of section names to exclude from rendering/validation.

classMembers.name: liveValidation
classMembers.doc: * Enable live per-section validation as the user navigates.

classMembers.name: showSectionValidationPanel
classMembers.doc: * Show the right-hand validation results panel for the active section.

classMembers.name: showNoValidationErrorsFound
classMembers.doc:
*
     * When true, allow success ticks to show when no errors.
     * When false (default), never show green ticks — only warnings/errors appear.

classMembers.name: masterObject
classMembers.doc: * Parent/master SObject API name (from getForm).

classMembers.name: formDeveloperName
classMembers.doc: * Actual API name of the form returned by getForm (may differ from @api formName).

classMembers.name: varLanguage
classMembers.doc: * 2-letter language code passed to Flow when getLanguage=true.

classMembers.name: isLoading
classMembers.doc: * Loading flags.

classMembers.name: sections
classMembers.doc: * All form sections (as returned by Apex).

classMembers.name: activeSectionId
classMembers.doc: * Currently active section id and Flow api name.

classMembers.name: scrollToFlow
classMembers.doc: * When true, scroll to Flow wrapper after section change.

classMembers.name: intervalId
classMembers.doc: * Interval id for polling for master triggers in storage.

classMembers.name: masterValidationInProgress
classMembers.doc: * Prevents double-submit of master validations.

classMembers.name: label
classMembers.doc: * i18n bundle injected from shared utilities.

classMembers.name: section
activeSection
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Id of the currently active section (from parent component).
     * Used to style this item as active and set ARIA state.
     * @type {string}

classMembers.name: sectionCSS
ariaSelected
statusId
hasStatus
statusTextForSR
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Screen-reader friendly status string describing the section’s validation state.
     * Example: "Eligibility: validation errors found."
     * @returns {string}

classMembers.name: describedById
handleOnSectionKeyDown
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Keyboard interaction handler for the section "button".
     * Activates selection on Enter or Space to match button semantics.

classMembers.name: handleOnSectionSelection
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Click/activate handler: notifies parent that this section is selected.
     * Emits: "sectionselected" with { sectionId, flowName }.

classMembers.name: dispatchEventFunction
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Small helper to dispatch a CustomEvent with the given name/detail.
     * @param {string} eventName
     * @param {CustomEventInit} eventDetail

classMembers.name: sectionName
classMembers.doc:
*
   * Section label this page component belongs to (recommended).
   * If omitted, falls back to store.currentSectionName.

classMembers.name: label
classMembers.doc: * i18n bundle injected from shared utilities.

classMembers.name: recordId
classMembers.doc: * The record Id to validate against.

classMembers.name: formName
classMembers.doc: * DeveloperName of the form to validate.

classMembers.name: parentObjectAPIName
classMembers.doc: * API name of the form’s parent/master SObject.

classMembers.name: cardTitle
classMembers.doc: * Card title text (header of this component’s UI).

classMembers.name: nextButtonLabel
classMembers.doc: * Label for the “Next”/submit button.

classMembers.name: completeFieldsText
classMembers.doc: * Helper text prompting users to complete fields.

classMembers.name: invalidCardDescription
classMembers.doc: * Description shown when validation failed.

classMembers.name: validCardDescription
classMembers.doc: * Description shown when validation passed.

classMembers.name: affectTextLabel
classMembers.doc: * Label used above the list of affected questions.

classMembers.name: sectionsToNotDisplay
availableActions
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Flow-provided list of available actions for this screen (e.g., ["NEXT", "BACK"]).
     * Used to decide whether we can dispatch FlowNavigationNextEvent.

classMembers.name: isLoading
classMembers.doc: * Spinner/initial state while Apex call is in-flight.

classMembers.name: sections
classMembers.doc: * Server-returned sections payload (used for detailed results display).

classMembers.name: hasErrors
classMembers.doc: * Whether server detected any errors across the form.

classMembers.name: isValid
classMembers.doc: * Whether the form is valid overall.

classMembers.name: success
classMembers.doc: * Whether the Apex validation call succeeded (transport + domain).

classMembers.name: message
classMembers.doc: * Optional server message.

classMembers.name: connectedCallback
classMembers.doc:
*
     * On mount, kick off a master (full-form) validation.
     * On success, emit a cross-component sessionStorage trigger.

classMembers.name: handleValidateFormData
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Execute the server-side full-form validation and update local view model.
     * On success, set the cross-component trigger in sessionStorage.

classMembers.name: handleNext
classMembers.doc:
*
     * If the Flow screen exposes a NEXT action, dispatch FlowNavigationNextEvent.
     * Safe no-op when NEXT is not available (e.g., configured differently).

classMembers.name: showToast
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Publish a lightning/platformShowToastEvent.
     * @param {string} toastTitle
     * @param {string} toastMessage
     * @param {"info"|"success"|"warning"|"error"} toastVariant

classMembers.name: label
classMembers.doc: * i18n bundle injected from shared utilities.

classMembers.name: page
affectTextLabel
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Label for the "affected questions" section shown beneath page errors.
     * Typically comes from shared labels (e.g., this.label.affectedQuestionsText).
     * @type {string}

classMembers.name: displayPage
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Whether to render this page entry.
     * Skips display when Apex returns a "NOPAGESCONFIGURED" placeholder.
     * @returns {boolean}

classMembers.name: label
classMembers.doc: * i18n bundle injected from shared utilities.

classMembers.name: helpText
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Help text displayed in the panel header or intro.
     * Defaults to labels.H8FFGeneralHelpText.
     * @type {string}

classMembers.name: affectTextLabel
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Label used above the list of items that are affected by validation errors.
     * Defaults to labels.H8FFAffectedQuestions.
     * @type {string}

classMembers.name: defaultOpen
classMembers.doc:
*
     * If true, the panel is expanded on first render.
     * @type {boolean}
     * @default false

classMembers.name: autoCollapseOnFix
classMembers.doc:
*
     * If true, panel will automatically collapse when errors transition from present -> none.
     * @type {boolean}
     * @default false

classMembers.name: liveHasErrors
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Live validation error flag (pre-master). Used when master is not provided.
     * @type {boolean}
     * @default false

classMembers.name: livePages
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Live validation pages payload. Expected shape:
     *   [{ pageLabel: string, errors: [{ message: string, field?: string }] }]
     * When master is not provided, these pages are displayed.
     * @type {Array}
     * @default []

classMembers.name: masterHasErrors
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Master validation error flag. When strictly true or false, master results take precedence.
     * If undefined, the component falls back to live results.
     * @type {boolean|undefined}

classMembers.name: masterPages
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Master validation pages payload. Same shape as livePages.
     * Displayed when masterHasErrors is strictly true/false.
     * @type {Array}
     * @default []

classMembers.name: isOpen
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Tracks whether the panel is currently open (expanded).
     * Initialized from `defaultOpen` on connectedCallback.
     * @type {boolean}
     * @reactive

classMembers.name: connectedCallback
classMembers.doc:
*
     * Initialize open/closed state from the public API.

classMembers.name: renderedCallback
classMembers.doc:
*
     * After each render, if autoCollapseOnFix is enabled and we detect a change
     * from errors=true to errors=false, close the panel.

classMembers.name: hasMaster
classMembers.doc:
*
     * True when masterHasErrors is explicitly provided (strict boolean),
     * meaning master results should be used.
     * @returns {boolean}

classMembers.name: hasErrors
pages
